name: Sonic and The Mystical Realms DEMO
name_original: Sonic and The Mystical Realms DEMO
description:
What has become of the Sun god, Solaris? Many believe he got erased from existence, while others believe he never existed at all. Those who believe these things may be wrong after all.

Uncover the untold truth of Solairis, and his rage against the world in this brand new sequel to Sonic Judgement! This is just the demo version. The full game will be released when I finish it. (DEMO: 3 levels) NOTE: (I don't own any of the music, characters, backgrounds, nor Sonic the Hedgehog himself. This is just a Fan Game DEMO.) Episode Shadow is completed! Enjoy the demo!
